title: Banned for third party software?
body:
Hello,

I've been playing league for about 6 years or more and have made tonnes of friends through the game. I've literally put so much time into this game on my account and never given anyone my details. The only third party software I can think I've been using is blitz of very late for tft?

Very lately I've seen a notification when I come out of my games that my account has been logged on elsewhere but it was so rare (like twice) that I didn't think much of it, maybe I got hacked and they used some software? I don't quite know but it's quite ridiculous

My account is Juny

Please revert the ban, I grew up playing this and I don't want to have to start again

replies.body: I just had the same problem! Someone accessed my account a week ago and spent all my essence and played a few games. Now I am banned for third-party software. RIOT PLEASE ADDRESS THIS
